content: If you read Dutch, are quasi-interested in the background of the Stack project, or just want some English quotes by Kevin, you can take a look at https://pbelmans.ncag.info/assets/naw5-2020-21-3-167.pdf
I love it how written Dutch is very much understandable for someone like me speaking english and some german, but no Dutch at all. Spoken Dutch, on the other hand, is a complete nightmare :-)
Note that @Patrick Massot is also cited towards the end of that article
For instance, the title is "Het Stacks project", where the only english mistake is that the letters in the first word have been randomly reordered.
